ModMetaData.name: [SS]King's slaves (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Mlie
ModMetaData.description:
Update of BJInternetSupervisions mod for RimWorld 1.1 https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1545402212
Support-chat: https://discord.gg/SuhwVpM
Non-steam version: https://github.com/emipa606/SSKingsSlaves
--- Original Description --- The space slave trade group faction. Those notorious slave trade groups own large slave trade ships, they are worse than pirates. They control a number of slaves to plunder other's space ship and base. They loot properties and people after they break through other's defence. You can easily persuade the slaves that you captured in the fight. You could either let them join your colony or become another slave trader and sell them to others. 王之奴隶 奴隶主集团派系。臭名昭著的奴隶主集团。他们拥有巨大的奴隶贩卖星舰，穿梭于宇宙之中比海盗还要可怕。他们控制奴隶用他们廉价的生命去攻占星球上的殖民地和其他飞船，他们攻进防线后就会将财产和人员全部掠夺一空。无论被俘获的人之前是什么身份，就连贵族也一样，都要戴上专用的枷锁成为奴隶被贱卖到黑市。你可以轻松地将被击倒俘获的奴隶说服，让他们成为自己的殖民，给他们自由；也可以将他们转手贩卖，成为奴隶商人大赚一笔。
